item.title: J.D. add a quote by N.T. Wright
item.description: "When we learn to read the story of Jesus and see it as the story of the love of God, doing for us what we could not do for ourselves--that insight produces, again and again, a sense of astonished gratitude which is very near the heart of authentic Christian experience." -- N.T. Wright

item.title: J.D. add a quote by N.T. Wright
item.description: "the work of salvation, in its full sense, is (1) about whole human beings, not merely souls; (2) about the present, not simply the future; and (3) about what God does through us, not merely what God does in and for us." -- N.T. Wright
